Source.Name: teamviewer
Source.Description: TeamViewer is a computer software for remote control, desktop sharing, and file transfer between Linux, Windows and Apple computers. TeamViewer is free for personal use. You can use TeamViewer completely free of charge to access your private computers or to help your friends with their computer problems. To buy a license for commercial use, please visit http://www.teamviewer.com
Teamviewer uzaktan bakım,online sunum ,dosya transferi yapmaya olanak sağlayan bir masaüstü paylaşım yazılımıdır.

Source.Name: easypaint
Source.Summary: EasyPaint is a simple graphics painting program
EasyPaint is a simple graphics painting program
Source.Description: EasyPaint is a part of Razor-qt
EasyPaint is a part of Razor-qt

Source.Name: draftsight
Source.Summary: DraftSight® - Free CAD software for your DWG files
DraftSight®: Programa CAD gratuito* de nivel profesional.
Source.Description: DraftSight profesyonel CAD kullanıcılarının, öğrencilerin ve eğitimcilerin DWG dosyalarını oluşturmasını, düzenlemesini ve görüntülemesini sağlar.
Mit DraftSight können professionelle CAD-Anwender, Studenten und Ausbilder DWG-Dateien erstellen, bearbeiten und ansehen.
DraftSight lets professional CAD users, students and educators create, edit and view DWG files.
Con DraftSight, los usuarios CAD profesionales, estudiantes y educadores pueden crear, editar y visualizar ficheros DWG.

Source.Summary: Webcamoid, webcam capture application,with ffmpeg,for working with the Gstreamer use the Gstreamer version
Source.Description: Webcamoid is a full featured webcam capture application.

Source.Description: brscan2 scanner driver is a sane backend which supports numerous Brother multifunction printers.

Source.Description: Master PDF Editor provides you advanced functions for working with PDF format.

Source.Name: google-chrome
Source.Description: Google Chrome ist ein Web-Browser der von Google Inc. entwickelt wird. Wichtige Bestandteile sind die Rendering-Engine Webkit, sowie die JavaScript Engine. Beliebt macht den Browser seine einfach zu bedienende Oberfläche und die hohe Geschwindigkeit.
Google Chrome is another web browser which runs web pages and applications with lightning speed due to its superior JavaScript rendering engine.

Google Chrome es un navegador web desarrollado por Google Inc... Usa el motor de renderizado WebKit, así como el motor de JavaScript. Un navegador popular con una interfaz fácil de usar y de alta velocidad.

Source.Name: gnofract4d
Source.Summary: Gnofract 4D is a free, open source program which allows anyone to create beautiful images called fractals.
Gnofract 4D is a free, open source program which allows anyone to create beautiful images called fractals.
Source.Description: The images are automatically created by the computer based on mathematical principles. These include the Mandelbrot and Julia sets and many more.
The images are automatically created by the computer based on mathematical principles. These include the Mandelbrot and Julia sets and many more.

Source.Summary: Free calls, text and picture sharing with anyone, anywhere!
Source.Description: Free calls, text and picture sharing with anyone, anywhere!
Ücretsiz arama, mesajlaşma ve konuşma yazılımı

Source.Name: dropbox-client
Source.Description: Dropbox is a Web-based file hosting service which uses cloud computing to enable users to store and share files and folders with others across the Internet using file synchronization.

Source.Name: kronometer
Source.Summary: Kronometer is a simple chronometer application built for KDE
Kronometer is a simple chronometer application built for KDE
Source.Description: Kronometer features the basic stopwatch actions (pause/resume/reset/laps), as well the ability to save the times on filesystem and resume them later.
Kronometer features the basic stopwatch actions (pause/resume/reset/laps), as well the ability to save the times on filesystem and resume them later.

Source.Description: Listen to music using Spotify
Spotify'ı kullanarak müzik dinleyin.

Source.Name: mp
Source.Description: A text editor for programmers including the following features:Fully scriptable using a C-like scripting language. Unlimited undo levels.Complete Unicode support. Multiple files can be edited at the same time and blocks copied and pasted among them. Syntax highlighting for many popular languages / file formats: C, C++, Perl, Shell Scripts, Ruby, Php, Python, HTML and much more

A text editor for programmers including the following features: Fully scriptable using a C-like scripting language. Unlimited undo levels. Complete Unicode support. Multiple files can be edited at the same time and blocks copied and pasted among them. Syntax highlighting for many popular languages / file formats: C, C++, Perl, Shell Scripts, Ruby, Php, Python, HTML and much more

Source.Name: otter-browser
Source.Summary: Otter-Browser Controlled by the user, not vice versa
Source.Description: Otter Browser aims to recreate the best aspects of the classic Opera (12.x) UI using Qt5.
